home.description: Hi, I'm Arb Rahim Badsa. I live on a tiny corner of the web. I write, design & code. I love to play with new problems like toys!

blogs.name: Blogs
blogs.description: Aritcles that you'll love reading! Starting from tech to life, I enjoy curving the letters on the pages of the web.

projects.name: Projects
projects.description: Displays some of my remarkable projects that I've worked on. I am a hobbyist programmer. I don't rest on weekend. I code, therefore I am!
